sentence.Network_en: This, he said, contained the essential principle Animalism.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说, 这包含了动物主义的实质原则.

sentence.Network_en: Puritanism was a natural revolt against that Naturalism which threatened to end in sheer animalism.
sentence.Network_cn: 清教主义乃是对于最终成为赤裸裸的兽性主义的自然反抗.

sentence.Network_en: Animalism had yieded to fanaticism and the bold , roving eye now gleamed with a ferocious righteousness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的兽欲变成狂热, 转来转去的眼睛现在闪烁着十分正直的光芒.
